Evaluation.explanation: The candidate demonstrates proficiency in several programming languages including Python, Java, C++, C#, JavaScript, and SQL. They also list frameworks and tools such as React, Angular, Flutter, Jira, and Git. The resume includes experience in front-end development, API integration, and CI/CD pipelines. The candidate has hands-on experience in using these technologies in various projects. However, there is no quantifiable metric to prove her proficiency. Overall, the CV shows a solid technical foundation.

The candidate has experience with debugging using VS Code and other tools. They have also managed support tickets using Jira. The resume mentions troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, including malware removal and system updates. However, the resume could benefit from more specific examples of complex problem-solving scenarios and the debugging tools they employed to resolve them, including the complexity and impact of the problems solved.

The candidate has experience collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and deploy web applications and mobile solutions. The resume mentions technical writing and documentation skills. The candidate has also worked as a team leader in multiple projects. The candidateâ€™s role as team leader shows a good approach to communication. Overall, the candidate demonstrates good collaboration and communication skills. However, concrete details of how the candidate approached conflict resolution is missing.

The candidate has experience with technical documentation and version control using Git. The resume mentions adhering to best practices for version control. The candidate has also documented technical workflows, development processes, and project milestones. However, there is no explicit discussion of coding standards to enhance code quality. Therefore, the code quality is not demonstrated clearly.

The candidate has experience with various technologies and frameworks, including React, Angular, and Flutter. The resume mentions implementing CI/CD pipelines. The candidate also highlights their interest in continuously learning and improving skills. Overall, the candidate has the characteristics of being adaptable and willing to learn. However, there are no certifications or personal projects that clearly demonstrate her intention to continuous growth in tech.

The candidate is expected to pay attention to details as they are working in software engineering positions. The resume reflects the attention to detail by listing achievements. However, there is no specific situation or project that highlights their attention to detail explicitly.

The candidate worked independently when managing over 100 support tickets using Jira. The resume mentions troubleshooting and resolving technical issues. The candidate also utilized scripting and Linux-based tools to streamline routine tasks. This shows that the candidate is able to perform tasks independently.
The candidate does not explicitly mention experience with Unity or Unreal Engine.

The candidate lists proficiency with HTML/CSS and JavaScript. The resume mentions building responsive and interactive front-end interfaces using React.js, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. The candidate has experience with front-end and back-end web development concepts.

The candidate has experience with testing and debugging using VS Code and other tools. The resume mentions performing malware removal and software patching. The candidate also states that they enhanced system security, and maintained a secure computing environment. This indicates some knowledge of quality assurance processes.
